code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useCallback}from'react';import api from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ExpenseList(){const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const fetchExpenses=useCallback(async()=>{try{const endpoint=userId?"/api/expenses/user/".concat(userId):'/expenses/';const res=await api.get(endpoint);setExpenses(res.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching expenses:',error);}},[userId]);useEffect(()=>{fetchExpenses();},[fetchExpenses]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Expenses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:userId,onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Filter by User ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchExpenses,children:"Fetch Expenses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:expenses.map(exp=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[exp.title," - $",exp.amount," on ",exp.date," (",exp.category,") [User: ",exp.user_id,"]"]},exp.id))})]});}
